scopecontent.p: The collection contains business and personal correspondence, deeds, military papers, certificates, newspapers, indentures, briefs of title, and business papers of Powers and Weightman, manufacturers of Quinine and other chemicals and the predecessor of Merck Pharmaceuticals. The volume is a receipt roll for regular issues (1863-1868), documenting name of recipient, date and place of enlistment, quantity and type of supplies issued, and signatures of receiver and witness. The volume also includes accounts current for clothing, etc. of the Quartermaster's Department.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
